data.message: I video called my friend who lives 3 hrs away.  Except there was a voice record that came up... I thought .. what ?  No call waiting.  Then I thought how fun it would be to join others in a video chat. Just like yahoo messenger does it. Group video would be fun for families to stay connected . Even companies to have meetings as well

replies.message: Thanks for the suggestion, April. We’re listening to all the feedback we get from our awesome community. Have anymore suggestions? Let us know at: http://bit.ly/2dJ7dW8 -Joe
